body.name: WESTERN ADVENTURE SERIES BOOKS 1–9 nine classic western action and adventure novels (Western Action and Adventure Box Sets)
body.description: GET *NINE* CLASSIC WESTERN ADVENTURES IN THIS GREAT-VALUE BOX SET.READERS LOVE A. A. GLYNN:⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐‘A really good Old Time Western novel.’ Terry C.⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐‘Such an entertaining and enjoyable Western.’ Todd S.⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐‘The action was full time, a real page turner.’ Joe E.Perfect for fans of Zane Grey, Louis L’Amour, John Deacon, Ron Schwab, Zachary McCrae and William W. Johnstone.IN THIS NINE-BOOK BOX SET:BOOK 1: TRAIL OF THE TOMAHAWK1850. Zachary McCaig is heading west with hatred in his heart, searching for the man who murdered his partner. His trail leads across the lands of Four Nations warriors where he falls for a woman from New England. Will she distract him from the revenge he has planned?BOOK 2: GUN FEUDWill Callender wants revenge for his brother’s murder. The killer is Cy Tambaugh, a ruthless and greedy ranch owner. He must find allies and overcome old enemies to avenge his brother. And Will knows the one name that will get Tambaugh’s attention — Rosalind. Can he use Tambaugh’s secret past to get what he wants?BOOK 3: MYSTERY AT BLACK BOULDERAn uprising is imminent in Black Boulder. Renegades have been selling rifles and firewater to the Sioux. Ex-army scout Lance Costigan rides into the reservation to confront notorious gunrunner, Eben Shaintuck, and restore peace. When he encounters two mystery gunmen armed with six-guns who stalk the reservation, he knows maintaining peace is going to be tough.BOOK 4: THE LONESOME GUNRod Strang returns to Arizona to claim his stolen inheritance. He finds trouble brewing as crooks Claybury and Gillman are hiring gunmen to incite a range war. Strang will do anything to get his ranch back and keep the peace. But as a lone man with a lonesome gun, he’ll need more than just luck on his side . . .BOOK 5: RENEGADE GOLDThe war is over. The South is beaten. Major Travis Eade follows orders to carry a haul of gold across the wasteland of the Arizona desert. He and his group of former Confederate soldiers are menaced by the Apache Indians. When they encounter the beautiful Marguerite Norman, Travis finds it’s not just the Indians who are the enemy. His comrades are hatching schemes of their own. How can Travis ensure his and Marguerite’s survival?BOOK 6: SIX-GUN SHOWDOWNRancher Major Cal McDade won’t hear of Washington ‘yankees’ fencing off his lands. He asks wayfarer Dan Herrick to return to Arizona and be a gunman for him. Herrick arrives in Centro — a lawless, derelict town. He will need to wrangle the last remnants of the Wild West and Confederate South in one mighty six-gun showdown.BOOK 7: GUNS ACROSS RED RIVERDannehar and Oskin were forceful and efficient peace officers in the wild days after the Civil War. Now a new enemy is gathering in the Indian Nations, set on using oil to overtake the cattle industry. A former comrade, Abel Aubert, calls on the pair to protect his town and the gunslingers head into Cherokee territory prepared to take on the new foe.BOOK 8: SIX-GUN PRODIGALLew Clennan returns to Tinkettle Basin with revenge on his mind. He will take down his brothers’ and father’s murderer Eli Brix and restore his family’s stolen land. But Lew has bounty hunters on his tail, and he needs to fight them too. Can he avenge his family and bring down Brix for good?BOOK 9: THE BUFFALO GUNInfamous gunfighter Will Keever arrives in Arrow Bridge armed with his powerful buffalo gun. He’s determined to stop ruthless Clay Glandon from driving homesteaders off their land. Will teams up with Tom Cardigan’s outfit, the TT, the only ones left to fight Glandon. The conflict turns deadly. Who will triumph as battle intensifies?ENJOY THESE GRIPPING WESTERN ADVENTURES IN ONE FANTASTIC BOX SET.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I enjoyed reading these books. It's not hard to imagine that some of these story,s could have been true. It showed of a good time in the West , and of reality also in the bar times in the west. Good reading

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Great western tales - Goodies and baddies.
reviews.reviewText: If you like western tales these are good and well worth a read. Good knowledge of the hard times in the West
